brief:
Generic class for handling tabular data, typically from a CSV, TSV,
           or other sort of spreadsheet file

methods.name: addColumn()
methods.desc: Adds a new column to a table

methods.name: removeColumn()
methods.desc: Removes a column from a table

methods.name: getColumnCount()
methods.desc: Returns the total number of columns in a table

methods.name: getRowCount()
methods.desc: Returns the total number of rows in a Table

methods.name: clearRows()
methods.desc: Removes all rows from a Table

methods.name: addRow()
methods.desc: Adds a new row of data to a Table object

methods.name: removeRow()
methods.desc: Removes a row from a Table object

methods.name: getRow()
methods.desc: Returns a reference to the specified TableRow

methods.name: rows()
methods.desc: Gets all rows from the table

methods.name: getInt()
methods.desc: Retrieves an integer value from the Table's specified row and column

methods.name: setInt()
methods.desc: Stores an integer value in the Table's specified row and column

methods.name: getFloat()
methods.desc: Retrieves a float value from the Table's specified row and column

methods.name: setFloat()
methods.desc: Stores a float value in the Table's specified row and column

methods.name: getString()
methods.desc: Retrieves a String value from the Table's specified row and column

methods.name: setString()
methods.desc: Stores a String value in the Table's specified row and column

methods.name: getStringColumn()
methods.desc: Retrieves all values in the specified column

methods.name: findRow()
methods.desc: Finds a row that contains the given value

methods.name: findRows()
methods.desc: Finds multiple rows that contain the given value

methods.name: matchRow()
methods.desc: Finds a row that matches the given expression

methods.name: matchRows()
methods.desc: Finds multiple rows that match the given expression

methods.name: matchRowIterator()
methods.desc: Finds multiple rows that match the given expression

methods.name: removeTokens()
methods.desc: Removes characters from the table

methods.name: trim()
methods.desc: Trims whitespace from values

methods.name: sort()
methods.desc: Orders a table based on the values in a column

description:
Table objects store data with multiple rows and columns, much like in a traditional spreadsheet. Tables can be generated from scratch, dynamically, or using data from an existing file. Tables can also be output and saved to disk, as in the example above.

Additional Table methods are documented in the Processing Table Javadoc.
name: Table
